ability.Berserk: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 when it reaches 1/2 or less max HP.
ability.Competitive: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by the target.

Fiery Wrath.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Nasty Plot.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

Air Slash.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Protect.effect: The user is protected from attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. Fails if the user uses this move last turn.

Roost.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.
